San_Bernardino.Cajon High School:
Cajon High School is located in the University District of San Bernardino, California, and is part of the San Bernardino City Unified School District.


== Academics ==
Cajon High School is part of the International Baccalaureate Organization (IB) including the high school portion of the Middle Years Programme and IB Diploma Programme. The school offers the AVID program as well.
